{"id":1327371822,"question_id":3455,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1721486985,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"221 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1327371822/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Length of String After Operations","memory":"32.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumLength(string s) {\n        int n = s.length();\n        \n        if(n<3){\n            return n;\n        }\n        \n        unordered_map<char, int> M;\n        for(auto i:s){\n            if(M[i]){\n                M[i] += 1;\n            }\n            else{\n                M[i] = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int sum = 0;\n        for(auto i:M){\n            while(i.second > 2){\n                i.second -= 2;\n            }\n            sum += i.second;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-length-of-string-after-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
